name: METROPOCRE
description:
Felix is an ordinary rabbit trying to get a brand new pair of wings. To accomplish that, he must go through a bloody and unusual experience in this anthropomorphic world. METROPOCRE is an experimental top-down shooter/beat 'em up with a character-driven story. Take the position of Felix, the rabbit, as he go through a serious of strange, psychodelic and hardcore adventures.

Main features:

- 27+ levels;
- 6 gameplay modes/characters;
- Score/Hi-Score functions;
- Speedrun timer;
- Hard difficulty and no continues;
- Lots of animals and stuff.
